item.description: A little bit about this post At MMS 2022 I took a huge leap and briefly presented this in the Tips & Tricks Session.

item.title: Finding Microsoft Graph API's from the Web
item.description: Why do I need to find these? Welcome (Back) to another post about the graph API’s, This time it isn’t so much about rambling through documentation but about giving you a nice handy tip on your route to finding what API is been called when browsing in the Web Console.

item.title: Enrol Devices to Autopilot (Unattended)
item.description: I have been working on a project at the company I work for, and up to this point we have been primarily focused on getting new devices imported and deploying via Autopilot.
